alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 112 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westview, or near Miami Gardens, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Miami Beach, Surfside, Hallandale, Miami Gardens, North Miami, Doral, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Dania Beach, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Sunny Isles Beach, Opa-Locka and West Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
